snippet: Police officers searched for a security employee after three of his co-workers were fatally shot and a fourth was wounded during a robbery attempt on the University of Alberta campus in Edmonton.
abstract: Police officers in Canada are searching for a security employee after three of his co-workers are fatally shot and a fourth is wounded during a robbery attempt on the University of Alberta campus in Edmonton.
lead_paragraph: Police officers searched for a security employee after three of his co-workers were fatally shot and a fourth was wounded during a robbery attempt on the University of Alberta campus in Edmonton.

headline.seo: Security Worker Is Sought in Shootings on Canadian Campus
headline.main: Security Worker Is Sought in Shootings on Canadian Campus
